text: [Music]
hello again
today i will be discussing loss
prevention
part of your job at los pollos hermanos
will be to protect the company's
valuable assets from theft and i don't
just mean guarding the register
theft can come in different shapes and
sizes as long as it affects profits it
endangers our entire operation
as a result
our team has developed a loss prevention
program for identifying and combating
theft
let's take a look at a few examples
a common example of loss occurs when
supplies go missing usually from
deliveries the best defense against this
is to keep an accurate record of our
inventory at all times with smaller
items like hot sauce sometimes it's a
good idea to weigh the entire cash after
the new stock has been added if you are
concerned weigh it twice for added
security finally when you're working
with food as delicious as ours you may
feel the desire to skim a fry or two i
must admit i understand the temptation
they can be
addictive
but it's a slippery slope and it's never
just one or two the only way to stop
this type of theft is to hold yourself
accountable
or buy a basket with your employee
discount that's all for today see you
next time when we'll be talking about
sustainability
[Music]
you
